comments:

view.".  The following walkback was in my .log file.  I had these perspectives 
active - Java, Resource, Team.  I hadn't used the Resource perspective, so this 
view did not have anything opened, in need of saving, etc.

This PR reminds me to one of the PRs that were on the 1.0 Rollup fixup list.
